about_the_game:
As you experience sleep paralysis in an abandoned setting, upon discovering the truth, you collapse and wake up convinced you've experienced sleep paralysis, unsure if you're still trapped in that state. Until, after being struck by the storm, you regain consciousness and find yourself in a desolate snow-covered forest. You have no idea how you got there or who you are, but you decide to get up and find out what happened. Your amnesia will be your greatest enemy as you try to unravel the secrets of this empty village; only you and your inner strength can guide you through the darkness to face your greatest adversary: fear.

Suddenly, you realize you remember nothing, but the cold reminds you that you're in mortal danger. You must find shelter before it's too late, before paralysis becomes your new enemy and a beast awakens, intensifying attacks of madness.



Join our community Discord server! Enjoy exclusive benefits, prizes, and giveaways. We aim to have a great time together and keep you updated with the latest product news. Don’t miss out! Find the link in the Steam links section.

Alan is the protagonist of our game. As the main character, his actions and experiences drive the narrative. Although awakening in an unfamiliar, initially confusing environment, Alan is determined to uncover the truth behind his situation and solve the mysteries surrounding the desolate, devastated village where he finds himself. Throughout the game, players take on the role of Alan, exploring the game world, interacting with other characters, and facing the challenges the game presents.



Mia is one of the key protagonists in our game. Imprisoned in the devastated village of DEPRISION, she becomes a beacon of hope for Alan, who awakens amidst confusion and chaos with no idea of his situation or identity. Mia possesses crucial knowledge about the origin of the mysterious virus plaguing DEPRISION and how to save those trapped in its lethal embrace.

As Alan delves into the dark heart of DEPRISION in search of answers, Mia becomes his guide and confidante, helping him navigate the dangers and challenges lurking around every corner. Her presence gives Alan the determination needed to confront his own doubts and fears, and the hope of finding a way out of this nightmare world.



However, the line between reality and illusion becomes blurred as the story progresses, and Alan is forced to question the true nature of his relationship with Mia. Is she really his wife, or just a creation of his disturbed mind induced by the virus? Only by unraveling the darkest secrets of DEPRISION can he discover the truth and find a way to save Mia and himself.

DEPRISION is a desolate village, where strange dark events often occur, voices are heard, creatures lurk, and mysterious events happen. Typically, those who venture into DEPRISION never return, and no one really knows why. There is a rumor that there is a virus circulating, affecting people mentally and psychologically. Fear keeps people away, and even those brave enough to attempt the journey hesitate to pay the ferryman. However, priority is to stay safe.



The ultimate psychological horror experience you'll enjoy, as it will make you feel what amnesia usually is. You'll experience every second firsthand, an immersive experience that will scare you and send shivers down your spine, providing auditory realism and claustrophobia.

What truly sets DEPRISION apart is its innovative body camera system, which adds an extra touch of realism to the game. Using advanced camera technology and visual effects, this system transports the player into the character's nightmare, offering a level of realism and movement that makes you feel like you're right there. Additionally, intermittent blinking is used in some areas and situations to increase realism and anxiety.

DEPRISION has been conceived with the vision of fully immersing players in a reality that goes beyond the screen. In this game, immersion is key: from facing sleep paralysis to exploring the depths of the mind of a character deeply tormented by amnesia and madness. Every moment revolves around a unique sensory experience.



The narrative is the pulsating heart of DEPRISION. With a protagonist tormented by delusional thoughts, constantly traveling on a journey through his own fractured psyche. Each interaction and discovery unlocks a new revelation, taking the player through exciting twists and turns that defy conventional expectations.

Sound also plays a crucial role in creating DEPRISION's uneasy atmosphere. Surrounding sounds immerse you even further into the game, making every whisper and creak keep you on edge at all times.

DEPRISION's graphics are exceptional, thanks to cutting-edge technologies like Lumen, Nanite, and Ray Tracing, along with meticulous attention to detail in every model and game environment. Virtual reality seamlessly merges with fantasy to create a visually stunning and realistic world. Each room reveals a new and captivating setting, taking the player on a constant journey of discovery. Narrative, graphics, and 8D audio blend seamlessly to provide a deeply immersive experience, giving the title a graphical depth that no other indie game has achieved to date. We are committed to maintaining the visual quality of the title for at least one generation, ensuring it remains visually stunning for years to come.



DEPRISION offers an unprecedented gaming experience that challenges the conventions of the psychological horror genre. With its combination of amazing graphics, immersive narrative, and total atmospheric immersion, this game promises to be a milestone in the interactive entertainment industry.

For more information about DEPRISION, we invite you to visit our lnk.bio. You can find it in the "View Stats" section within the Steam links section.

DEPRISION offers a wide variety of features and advantages as a product. If you're interested in psychological horror, paranormal events, we cordially invite you to explore DEPRISION on Steam.



We are planning a future update scheduled for the year 2025, so we ask for your patience as we work on new surprises for this period. In the meantime, we encourage you to enjoy the game's current experience to the fullest until its release. We appreciate your interest and ongoing support.

We strive for perfection in every achievable aspect, and that's what we will achieve, a product that breaks all records, and that we, as a studio, can produce. Have faith in us, because when we do something, we do it perfectly.



Get ready to delve into the unknown and face your worst fears in DEPRISION.

If you're still alive, perhaps you can expect something more...

content_descriptors.notes: DEPRISION features bloody, terrifying scenes, intense violence, strong verbal language, explicitly resembling terror and fear.

name: DEPRISION

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-1215G4 2-Core 4.10GHz Processor or equivalent | AMD Ryzen 5 5600X quad core.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 6GB | AMD Radeon RX 6500 XT 6GB.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 120 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required All requirements are subject to change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11.
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-12400F processor with 6 cores and 4.4GHz frequency | AMD Ryzen 7 5600X with 6 cores and 4.6GHz frequency.
  • Memory: 24 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3090 24GB | AMD Radeon RX 6900 XT.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 120 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required All requirements are subject to change.

esrb.descriptors:
Blood and gore
Explicit Language
High-impact Violence
Nudity

short_description: DEPRISION is a psychological horror game that delivers an immersive and terrifying AAA experience. Survive human madness, amnesia's power, and navigate parallel worlds via a deadly virus. Solve your world's problem, survive, prevent more deaths, and escape before it's too late.
supported_languages:
Spanish - Spain*, Spanish - Latin America*, English*, French, German, Bulgarian, Czech, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Dutch, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Arabic
*languages with full audio support
